snippet: How is it that even a useful, job-creating government agency like the Export-Import Bank is ripe for attacking by the right?
abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column criticizes Tea Party campaign to eliminate the Export-Import Bank; argues there is no reason to oppose an agency that promotes exports and American jobs while contributing to revenue; holds push, led by Rep Jeb Hensarling, points up the ideological absurdity of the far-right and could endanger one of the most useful government agencies.
lead_paragraph: How is it that even a useful, job-creating government agency like the Export-Import Bank is ripe for attacking by the right?
